column3: Organise toys (living room and kids bedroom)
Wipe appliances: fridge, oven, kettle, rice cooker, blender, microwave etc
Deep-clean sink: clean strainer, drain cover, put Mr.Muscle
Deep clean vessel holder and bottle dryer
Deep clean stove hood filters & backsplash
Organise food pantry and remove expired food
Deep-clean sink: clean strainer, drain cover, put Mr.Muscle
Clean washer/dryer lint filter and water collector
Vacuum under bed / behind storage boxes
Separate outgrown kids clothes; bag donations
Remove trash from strollers, wipe down
Wash and replace kids sleeping bag sheets from school
